Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ACT2009::CarThis class contains all Car-dependant data to be handled by multiple parts of the game
ACT2009::CollisiondetectThis class handles the collisiondetection to find when the car crosses the borders of the track
ACT2009::DisplayThis class displays the scenery, the car and the objects of the virtual environment
ACT2009::Game1The core-class of the ACT2009 Project
ACT2009::InputThis class provides the current user-orders through the controller and/or keyboard the car should follow
ACT2009::MathHelperclass for math calculations
ACT2009::MenusThis class displays the menus showed on the beginning and end of the game
ACT2009::ModelPositionsThis class is a container for a list of positions and its corresponding Model that shall be displayed
ACT2009::PhysicsThis class recalculates the position, direction and speed depending on the input and the car status
ACT2009::PlayThis class displays the heads up display
ACT2009::SoundsThis class plays the sound to be heared in the game
